description:
This app is as promised. A very lightweight and clear spotify alternative. It doesn't have any restrictions of a free account and integrates very well with an existing account! It does need you to sign in using a strange method where by you take some cookies using inspect element on your browser to sign in but after following the built in guide, it works perfectly. 

I mentioned in the summary that it needs a little polish. Here's what I have found.
- Hovering over the buttons for each track in a playlist bring up a context text that reads "widget" no matter which of the four you hover over.
- I can't really tell if a song I clicked download on has actually been downloaded. The button reacts to a click but there is no indication that the song is currently downloaded. (It does actually download if you check the destination directory)
- There is no shuffle option
- The download folder doesn't seem to be configurable
- The playerlist download button is grayed out
- the volume slider isn't consistant

All in all it's a cool product if you don't have a premium account. It's very lightweight too which is a big plus. It's just really needs some refinement.
summary: Works very well! Needs a little polish but is very nice!
